sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is reserved for a particular person or purpose
, je pripravljeno ali urejeno posebej za določeno osebo ali namen.

seg.quote: The garden is reserved for those who work in the museum.
St Faith's Chapel is reserved for private prayer.

sense.def:
A reserve
je ponavadi večja količina nečesa, shranjena zato, da jo lahko uporabimo, ko jo potrebujemo.

seg.quote: He was able to draw on vast reserves of talent and enthusiasm.

sense.def:
Kadar imamo nekaj
in reserve
, smo tisto shranili, da bi nam bilo na voljo, ko bomo tisto potrebovali.

seg.quote: I kept some tranquillizers in reserve in case I became agitated.

sense.def:
V športu je
a reserve
igralec, ki čaka, da bo zaigral v moštvu, če neki drug igralec ne bi mogel več igrati.

A nature reserve
je ozemlje, na katerem so živali in rastline uradno zavarovane.

To show reserve
pomeni skrivati čustva.

seg.quote: His tone had lost the cautious reserve it had previously had.
